results.title: India Respiratory Market to Reach $4.2B by 2028 - FiercePharma
results.snippet: The Indian respiratory market is experiencing rapid growth driven by rising pollution levels and increasing COPD/asthma prevalence. Generic competition remains limited in novel biologics.

results.title: COPD Burden in India: 55 Million Patients - Lancet
results.snippet: India has the highest COPD burden globally with 55 million patients. Current treatments are inadequate, creating significant unmet medical need.

results.title: FDA Approves Keytruda for Endometrial Cancer - FDA.gov
results.snippet: The FDA has granted approval for Pembrolizumab (Keytruda) in combination with lenvatinib for advanced endometrial cancer, expanding its indication portfolio.

results.title: Merck Announces Positive Phase III Results in Bladder Cancer
results.snippet: Pembrolizumab shows significant improvement in overall survival for muscle-invasive bladder cancer patients in the KEYNOTE-866 trial.

results.title: Sun Pharma Launches Generic Sitagliptin at 60% Discount
results.snippet: Following patent expiry, Sun Pharmaceutical launched generic Sitagliptin in India at Rs 8 per tablet, compared to Rs 22 for the branded version.

results.title: Bayer Prepares Authorized Generic Strategy for Xarelto
results.snippet: Bayer is planning to launch an authorized generic of Rivaroxaban to maintain market share ahead of full generic competition expected in 2025.

results.title: Idiopathic Pulmonary Fibrosis: Limited Treatment Options
results.snippet: Only two drugs (Pirfenidone and Nintedanib) are approved for IPF. Both slow progression but do not cure. Significant opportunity for novel therapies.

results.title: Ozempic, Wegovy Shortage Continues Through 2024
results.snippet: Novo Nordisk struggles to meet unprecedented demand for Semaglutide products. Manufacturing expansion underway but shortages expected through 2024.

results.title: FDA Lists Wegovy in Drug Shortage Database
results.snippet: The FDA has officially listed Wegovy (semaglutide 2.4mg) as in shortage, affecting patients seeking obesity treatment across the United States.

results.title: Tirzepatide Shows Superior Weight Loss vs. Semaglutide - NEJM
results.snippet: Head-to-head trial demonstrates tirzepatide achieving 22.5% weight loss versus 15% for semaglutide, establishing new standard in obesity treatment.

results.title: Humira Biosimilars Capture 30% Market Share in First Year
results.snippet: Multiple adalimumab biosimilars have collectively captured 30% of the US market within 12 months of launch, with Amgen's leading adoption.

results.title: FDA Grants Breakthrough Therapy Status to Psilocybin
results.snippet: The FDA has granted breakthrough therapy designation to psilocybin for treatment-resistant depression, accelerating development timeline.

results.title: India Pharma Market to Reach $65B by 2025 - IBEF
results.snippet: India's pharmaceutical market is projected to reach $65 billion by 2025, driven by increasing healthcare access and chronic disease prevalence.

results.title: Generic Drug Exports from India Surpass $25B
results.snippet: India remains the world's largest supplier of generic medicines, with exports exceeding $25 billion annually. US and Europe are largest markets.
